author: nikmagini
body:
New pre-release of PhEDEx agents 4.2.0

Main feature is new FTS3 backend

For full list see here:

https://github.com/dmwm/PHEDEX/blob/00850a498253eee97fc4a68d8632c92f36b1fe27/Documentation/ChangeLog#L1-L26

Need to build pre-release to distribute to the sites for wider testing

Note: this time we need to test if there is any impact on ASO, since the PHEDEX-micro component used by ASO is potentially changed.
title: Increase PhEDEx agents to 4.2.0pre3
